revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=AirStation WZR-1750 |revision=DHP |series=AC1750 |upc=747464126791 |asin=B00D69747O |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9117G |manuf_rev=AC33 |availability=now |fcc_date=05/17/2013 |fcc_id=FDI000000009 |ic_id=6102A-045 |pcb_id=141911720001J |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708A0 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Zentel |fla1_model=A5U1GA31ATS-BC |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=PieceMakers |ram1_model=PMF512816ABR-KADN |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Buffalo-G-XXXX, Buffalo-A-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Buffalo-G-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$,,, ^Buffalo-A-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }} {{TagLine|AirStation Extreme AC1750 Gigabit DualBand Wireless Router}} :[http://buffalo.jp/product/wireless-lan/ap/wzr-1750dhp/ Product page] (JP) "P/N: 141911720001J R0B1" appears to be silkscreened on the main board.
"141911620001J" and "PATENT PENDING" is silkscreened on the antennas. Additional info, per the FCC internal photos... *The 5GHz radio is using three [[Skyworks]] SE5003L1 5GHz PAM. *The 2.4GHz radio is using three [[Skyworks]] (''SiGe'') [http://phx.corporate-ir.net/phoenix.zhtml?c=131895&p=irol-newsArticle&ID=1700613 SE2605L] PAM. *The capacitors appear to be from '''TAICON'''. Default settings and SSID patterns (which appear to be '''Buffalo-A-XXXX''' :and '''Buffalo-G-XXXX''') are from the FCC manual. ===PSU=== The power adapter shown in the FCC documents is an '''Asian Power Devices''' :APD DA-48Q12 (100~240VAC 50~60Hz 1.2A max. -> 12VDC 4A) ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32208-buffalo-wzr-1750dhp-airstation-extreme-ac1750-gigabit-dual-band-wireless-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/171-buffalo-wzr-1750dhp.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] ===See also=== *[[Buffalo WZR-600DHP2]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9116H22 (BCM47081A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-900DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9116H33 (BCM47081A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-1166DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9117EAC22 (BCM4708A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-1750DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9117GAC33 (BCM4708A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-D1800H]] • [[Arcadyan]] WA9116BAC33 (BCM4706) __NOTOC__
